query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPSTW1905 SET HOGI = #HOGI# ,ZSITE_NM = #ZSITE_NM# ,LIFNR = #LIFNR# ,LIFNR_NM = #LIFNR_NM# ,HDEL_YN = #HDEL_YN# ,PERNO = #PERNO# ,VICTIM_NM = #VICTIM_NM# ,ZZACTSS_NM = #ZZACTSS_NM# ,AGE = #AGE# ,CAREER_MON = #CAREER_MON# ,EVT_YMD = #EVT_YMD# ,EVT_TM = #EVT_TM# ,WTHER = #WTHER# ,TEMPR = #TEMPR# ,LIFNRCHK = #LIFNRCHK# ,CONTR_PR = #CONTR_PR# ,ZQNTY = #ZQNTY# ,VALUE = #VALUE# ,ZSPEC5 = #ZSPEC5# ,CHARGE1 = #CHARGE1# ,CHARGE2 = #CHARGE2# ,CHARGE3 = #CHARGE3# ,CHARGE4 = #CHARGE4# ,EVT_GBN1 = #EVT_GBN1# ,EVT_GBN2 = #EVT_GBN2# ,EVT_GBN3 = #EVT_GBN3# ,EVT_GBN4 = #EVT_GBN4# ,EVT_GBN5 = #EVT_GBN5# ,EVT_GBN6 = #EVT_GBN6# ,EVT_TYPE = #EVT_TYPE# ,EVT_GBN_ETC = #EVT_GBN_ETC# ,INFOBJ = #INFOBJ# ,CSOBJ = #CSOBJ# ,SUMMARY = #SUMMARY# ,EVT_DCS1 = #EVT_DCS1# ,EVT_DCS2 = #EVT_DCS2# ,EVT_ICS1 = #EVT_ICS1# ,EVT_ICS2 = #EVT_ICS2# ,EVT_ICS3 = #EVT_ICS3# ,EVT_CS_ETC = #EVT_CS_ETC# ,DEG_INJ = #DEG_INJ# ,SAFETY_MSR = #SAFETY_MSR# ,LEGAL_ACT = #LEGAL_ACT# ,AGR_AMT = #AGR_AMT# ,LOST_WKDAY = #LOST_WKDAY# ,SEDU = #SEDU# ,BIGO = #BIGO# ,MODID = #G_USER_ID# ,MODDT = TO_CHAR(CURRENT TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND EVTSEQ = #EVTSEQ#
